pages.text: The Crafter is a block that crafts items with $(l:pattern)patterns$(). It can take $(l:upgradesrs)speed upgrades$() to increase the crafting speed. With processing patterns, the Crafter has to face the correct input side of the machine.$(br2)Chaining$(br)A Crafter can be chained by letting them face each other. This is useful when connecting a Crafter to a single machine.

When you run out of slots in your first Crafter, the one facing the machine, you can put another Crafter behind the first Crafter to get additional Pattern slots.$(br2)Read $(l:autocrafting)this$() and $(l:autoprocessing)this$() for more.
